channel.title: Sound on EasyRSC & Events on EasyRSC
channel.description:
Sound: I don't know if everyone has this problem but the sound on EasyRSC won't work at all. I don't know if I have to activate it somehow or what. Just in case you're wondering, my sound does work on runescape 2 (both the real one and my rs2 server)
Events: I've seen that there are events on EasyRSC but I don't know how to start an event.. I'm probably just stupid but please let me know how to start an event.
Thanks for the help.

item.title: Sound on EasyRSC & Events on EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @Shadowsoul Shadowsoul
item.description:
@Shadowsoul wrote:

Its odd that the sound doesn’t work but when the player does some “events” you can see a line of code that has the sound play on it.

Read full topic
item.source: Sound on EasyRSC & Events on EasyRSC

item.title: Sound on EasyRSC & Events on EasyRSC
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

Dueling a player, trading a player, fighting a player even walking to a player/npc/object is all an “event” that happens in the server. You can think of it like an action; when the player does something, its called an event. The events your thinking about is like a “mini-game” which does not come in the source.

And yes, sound does not work on easy-rsc

Read full topic
item.source: Sound on EasyRSC & Events on EasyRSC

item.description:
@Shadowsoul wrote:

Command Handler
Also I’m pretty sure its somewhere here:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363007.0.html[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 12, 2009, 11:31:01 am[/size][hr]So if you wanted to make a PK event you would somehow make a command called ::event that teles you to PK area.

item.description:

Like capture the flag or something. I found a folder in EasyRSC that says events and one of the events was duelevent. How do I use these events ingame? Thanks
